CommandPalette.Placeholder: Start typing to see available commands

CharacterSheet.OpenHint: Finds an actor given -name <name>, and opens its sheet. E.g. -name "John Doe"
CharacterSheet.OpenHint2: Search 'actor: <name>' and open the sheet of that actor.

ItemSheet.OpenHint: Finds an item given -name <name>, and opens its sheet. E.g. -name "Excalibur"
ItemSheet.OpenHint2: Search 'item: <name>' and open the sheet of that item.

Settings.OpenHint: Shortcut to open the settings menu

Macros.OpenHint: Shortcut to open the macros menu

ToggleKey.Name: Toggle Key
ToggleKey.Description: The key that toggles the command palette
